summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Wheeler Street, from Bigelow Avenue North to 5th Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 98979 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
